description: ff. 71. 178 x 130; 125 x 80 mm. 18 lin. Maghribi. 17th/18th cen. An epistle addressed to Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Qāsim al-Mashaddālī, d. 866/1461 (Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 302, 6). Incip.:... الحمد لله الذى فتح بمفاتىح العقول افقال الافهام ... وبعد فهذه رسالة
author: Bijāʼī, Aḥmad Abū ʻAṣīdah, d. ca. 1460
title: Risālat al-gharīb ilá al-ḥabīb.
creator: Bijāʼī, Aḥmad Abū ʻAṣīdah, d. ca. 1460
subject: Travelers—Africa, North—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
